questions.question: How long is the Golden Gate Bridge (m)?
U.S. Route 20 is the longest road in the United States. How long is it (km)?
What is the highest measured top speed with a car (2020)? Answer in km/h.
questions.answerText: 533 km/h or 331 mph (SSC Tuatara by Koenigsegg)

questions.question: How many countries does the Sahara desert pass through?
In what year was the word "pizza" documented for the first time (A.C)?
What is the length of the longest ship that has ever been built (m)?
How many unique people have climbed Mount Everest (Jan 2021)?
Gordie Howe has the most played number of NHL games (2021). How many games did he play?
questions.answerText: Answer: 1767 (he is also the oldest player to play a NHL-game, playing at the age of 52)

questions.question: What year was Leonardo da Vinci born?
How many earths would fit into the sun?
questions.answerText: Approximately 1.3 million Earths could fit inside the sun

questions.question: How tall was the tallest human ever (cm)?
questions.answerText: Robert Wadlow, the "Alton Giant," became world-famous for being, at 272cm, the the tallest man in recorded history.

questions.question: How high is mount everest (m)?
How deep is the deepest point of the ocean (m)?
questions.answerText: The maximum known depth is 10,984 metres (36,037 ft) (± 25 metres [82 ft]). It's known as the Challenger Deep of the Mariana Trench

questions.question: How many times bigger is Russia than the smallest country in the world, Vatican City?
What’s the world record of most straws stuffed in the mouth?
questions.answerText: It was achieved by Nataraj Karate, in Salem, Tamil Nadu, India, on 25 August 2018.

questions.question: What year was the word "dinosaur" coined by Richard Owen
What year was anesthesia used for the first time
What year was the first piano built?
questions.answerText: It was built by Bartolomeo Cristofori

questions.question: What year was Alaska discovered?
questions.answerText: It was discovered by Vitus Bering

questions.question: What year did Coca-Cola start using plastic bottles?
questions.answerText: Coca-Cola and Pepsi, introduced the first 2l PET plastic bottles to the World back in 1978.

questions.question: How tall is Burj Khalifa, the tallest building in the world (m)?
questions.answerText: Located in Dubai, United Arab Emirates. It has 163 floors.

questions.question: How many McDonald's resaturants existed worldwide in 2020?
